OU football helmet at the Big  Media Days on July  PERIOD

Fivestar  receiver DeAndre Moore Jr PERIOD announced his commitment to the Sooners live via CBS Sports HQ on Friday PERIOD

BREAKING  WR DeAndre Moore Jr PERIOD has just Committed to Oklahoma he tells On3RecruitsOklahoma adds to the  Ranked Class in 2023More Here FREE httpst.con5RLaHxMps pic.twitter.comMPLNV9q7Sr

Moore is the No PERIOD  wide receiver in the country and the No PERIOD  player in California according to 247Sports Composite Rankings PERIOD  Sports also considers Moore the No PERIOD  overall player in the  recruiting cycle PERIOD

 Moore said on CBS Sports HQ PERIOD 

The 5foot9 190pounder is OUs third  commit from Los Alamitos High School joining fivestar quarterback Malachi Nelson and fivestar receiver Makai Lemon PERIOD Moore also plays safety for the Griffins but is expected to focus on receiver at OU PERIOD

 Moore said of his high school teammates efforts to recruit him PERIOD 

With Moores commitment the Sooners enhance what is already the nations No PERIOD  recruiting class for the  cycle PERIOD Alongside Moore Nelson and Lemon OU has garnered commitments from fivestar receiver Brandon Inniss fourstar running back Treyaun Webb fourstar tight end Luke Hasz and threestar offensive lineman Joshua Bates PERIOD
